about.mainTitle: Learn to play without notes! Bagpipe and flute training app
about.listDescription: Melodies that can be played on the selected instrument. It can be changed in settings
about.settingsDescription:
change instrument
change the tone of the melody to match your instrument
preclick - additional countdown to the start of the performance to blow the bagpipe, prepare
change language
about.updates:
New melodies: Baharodzitca, Marazulia, Was wollen wir trinken, Aniol, Pahonia, Lipka, Try charapahi, Villeman og Magnhild
the bar can be looped (round arrows icon)
the form to ask for new songs and feedback are added (black button in bottom right corner in the settings)
about.updates_short: New melodies: Kino - Peremen, Baharodzitca, Marazulia, Was wollen wir trinken, Aniol, Pahonia, Lipka, Try charapahi, Villeman og Magnhild
